author: Wsj Staff
title: Indian Budget: What Time Is the Announcement in New Delhi? - India Real Time - WSJ
text: Indian Budget: What Time Is the Announcement in New Delhi? The Wall Street Journal is covering Finance Minister Arun Jaitley's announcement live ENLARGE Indian Finance Minister Arun Jaitley is set to present the budget on Wednesday. Above, Mr. Jaitley prepared to present the 2016 budget in New Delhi, India, Feb. 29, 2016. Photo: Tsering Topgyal/Associated Press By
